## isLightBackground() function

Determine if an RGB color is "light" based on luminance.

Uses WCAG-compliant luminance calculation with 0.179 threshold.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function isLightBackground(rgb: RGB): boolean;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

rgb


</td><td>

[RGB](./chromaterm.rgb.md)


</td><td>

RGB color with values 0-255


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

boolean

true if the color is light, false if dark
